[tags]: 
How to visualize higher correlation between replicates within the control than with the treatment samples?

The treatment which I have applied to my samples did not cause much changes comparing to the control samples. I have prepared 4 replicates for the control and 4 replicates for a treatment. I would like to show that control replicates cluster together and treatment replicates together (if it is a case). The idea is to show that samples within the control and treatment have the higher correlation than the replicates between two conditions. I was thinking about performing PCA analysis but the way I visualized it it could not be visible. Do you have any other ideas ? First 4 are the control replicates and next 4 are from treatment samples. I would like to show that rows from the first four columns are together and rows from last 4 columns belong together. I think that it should be like that. If not... I have to show it anyway :). PCA analysis ? Tree cluster ?
